title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy Teams at scale for frontline workers
description:
Deploying Teams at Scale
enables your admins to deploy up to 500 teams and add 25 users per team using
one Teams PowerShell command and 2 csv files. This allows admins to meet their
organization's scale needs and significantly reduces deployment time. Admins
can also use this solution to add and remove members from existing teams at
scale.
